backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing two features with associated components, files, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for core frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a grayscale OKLCH variable color system for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the SPA root and sets the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing all site sections and navigation.
frontend/src/components/content/sarcasmL: Exports an array of 20 sarcastic oneâ€‘liners for dynamic display.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar with scrolling behavior, active-section highlighting, and mascot logo.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Renders a grid of six humorous feature cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Footer with mascot logo, grouped link lists, and attribution line.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background texture, mascot logo, headline, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Sarcasm: Interactive section cycling through sarcasm lines with a button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Renders a testimonials grid with humorous fake user quotes, using a static array of testimonial data. Includes layout, star ratings, and comedic disclaimers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks which page section is currently visible using IntersectionObserver. Returns the active section ID to support navigation highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes. Uses React Query to cache and refetch actor instances.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login flow, logout, and status tracking. Wraps the app with an AuthClient-backed provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the backend exposes no methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, along with global typography and utility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, image requirements, mascot generation tasks, and pending requests for a red-accented mascot.
